body:
With Cython 0.29.10:
```
Error compiling Cython file:
------------------------------------------------------------
...
        for array in arrays:
            c_arrays.push_back(array.sp_array)
        for name in names:
            c_names.push_back(tobytes(name))

        c_result = CStructArray.Make(c_arrays, c_names)
                              ^
------------------------------------------------------------

    as_name = 'StructArray',
    class_name = 'StructArray',
    doc = '\n    Concrete class for Arrow arrays of a struct data type.\n    ',
    module_name = '',
    visibility = 'private')
CClassDefNode.body = StatListNode(array.pxi:1385:4)
StatListNode.stats[2] = CompilerDirectivesNode(array.pxi:1443:4)

StatListNode.stats[0] = DefNode(array.pxi:1443:4,
    doc = '\n        Construct StructArray from collection of arrays representing each field\n        in the struct\n\n        Parameters\n        ----------\n        arrays : sequence of Array\n        names : List[str]\n            Field names\n\n        Returns\n        -------\n        result : StructArray\n        ',
    is_staticmethod = True,
    modifiers = [...]/0,
    name = 'from_arrays',
    np_args_idx = [...]/0,
    num_required_args = 1,
    outer_attrs = [...]/2,
    py_wrapper_required = True,
    reqd_kw_flags_cname = '0',
    self_in_stararg = True,
    used = True)

    result_is_used = True,
    use_managed_ref = True)
File 'ExprNodes.py', line 6833, in infer_type: AttributeNode(array.pxi:1478:31,
    attribute = 'Make',
    is_attribute = 1,
    needs_none_check = True,
    result_is_used = True,
    use_managed_ref = True)
File 'ExprNodes.py', line 6925, in analyse_as_type_attribute: AttributeNode(array.pxi:1478:31,
    attribute = 'Make',
    is_attribute = 1,
    needs_none_check = True,
```

comment_data.body: This seems to be a duplicate of #2167.

title: Compiler crash in AnalyseExpressionsTransform
